name: +5 Gold
desc: Gain 5 gold immediately.

name: +10 Gold
desc: Gain 10 gold immediately.

name: Royal Expansion
desc: Start future battles with one bonus queen in a random slot.

name: Rapid Pawns
desc: Your pawns move 3 on their first turn for the rest of the run.

name: Pawn Shield
desc: Pawns grant +1 defense to adjacent allies.

name: Knight Dash
desc: Knights can immediately move again after capturing.

name: Bishop Channel
desc: Bishops gain +1 diagonal range.

name: Rook Fortress
desc: Rooks cannot be captured while defended.

name: Queen Fury
desc: Your queen’s first move each battle is free.

name: King’s Guard
desc: The king gains +1 defense for each adjacent ally.

name: Bank Interest
desc: Gain +1 gold after each victory.

name: Spoils of War
desc: Gain +2 gold for every captured enemy piece.

name: Golden Touch
desc: Receive 50% more gold from victories.

name: Extra Slot
desc: Add one more slot to your army layout.

name: Budget Boost
desc: Increase your draft budget by +3 for all future stages.

name: Scout Ahead
desc: Preview the next enemy’s formation before drafting.

name: Opening Gambit
desc: Gain +1 gold if your first move captures an enemy.

name: Momentum
desc: Gain +1 move speed after each capture (resets each stage).

name: Reinforcements
desc: Spawn one extra pawn at the start of every battle.

name: Fog of War
desc: Enemy pieces start hidden for the first turn.

name: Time Dilation
desc: Enemy AI is slowed for the first 5 turns of battle.

name: Weak Morale
desc: Enemies lose one random piece at the start after stage 5.

name: Predictive Line
desc: Highlights your two best moves each turn.

name: Exploding Pawns
desc: Pawns explode when captured, damaging adjacent enemies.

name: Double Turn
desc: Every 5th turn, you may move twice.

name: Piece Swap
desc: Once per battle, swap any two of your pieces.
